title: F35 Mini-Ep 1: Exercise and Simple Skincare
itunes:title: F35 Mini-Ep 1: Exercise and Simple Skincare
itunes:subtitle: It’s the first Forever35 mini-episode! On these weekly half-hour eps, Kate and Doree will be responding to listener questions and doing short product reviews. This week, they talk about their workout habits, and give advice to a woman who wants to deve...
description:
It’s the first Forever35 mini-episode! On these weekly half-hour eps, Kate and Doree will be responding to listener questions and doing short product reviews. This week, they talk about their workout habits, and give advice to a woman who wants to develop a very simple skincare routine. 

For more info and a list of products mentioned on this week's episode, visit forever35podcast.com. You can also join the Forever35 Facebook group, follow the podcast on Instagram and Twitter, and send them an email at forever35podcast@gmail.com. And now you can call them and leave a voicemail at 781-591-0390!

This episode is sponsored by milk + honey, a small-batch, organic skincare company in Austin, Texas. To save 25% off your first order, go to milkandhoney.com and enter code FOREVER25.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
